channel.title: Im worried,Is this possible?
channel.description: Hey all So,the other day,i demoted this guy because he just wasnt following the rules Problem is,he knew my ip. He threatened to use cheat client,so i just ip banned him and thought that would be the last of it. But now he is saying that he is gonna post my ip into other chatbox's,is my server screwed? If so,how can i avoid this Thanks Pasta186

item.title: Im worried,Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @andr3wrulz andr3wrulz
item.description:
@andr3wrulz wrote:

with an ip address you can do alot but if you have any type of firewall it will take them a long time or it may even be impossible and odds are they will give up. but besides whats the worst that can happen if you(like a responsible server owner)back up your server data

in other words youre fine but you should always keep a backup!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Im worried,Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Thanks
Its good to know i can converse with other coders
I banned him from my forums,ipbanned from game
If you ever get someone called k i n g or k i n s on your game,i suggest being cautious lol
Thanks again
Pasta186

Read full topic

item.title: Im worried,Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Dont listen to jerks like that, they are just pissed.

As for your server, don’t worry.

Read full topic
